CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Work location in scheduling assistant for iOS
CurrentVersion.description: You can now view your colleagues' work locations when scheduling a meeting.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Work location in scheduling assistant for iOS
OldVersion.description: You can now view your colleagues' work locations when scheduling a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Editor Text Predictions
CurrentVersion.description: When you compose or edit content in OneNote, Editor Text Predictions anticipates your writing and suggests a suitable word or phrase inline. This saves time and helps you reduce typos.

OldVersion.title: OneNote: Editor Text Predictions
OldVersion.description: When you compose or edit content in OneNote, Editor Text Predictions anticipates your writing and suggests a suitable word or phrase inline. This saves time and helps you reduce typos.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Set survey be closed at a specific time.
CurrentVersion.description: Allowing Glint Admins to close an active survey at a specific time instead of the default end-of-day (12:00 AM).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service to set survey deactivation times
OldVersion.description: Improved self service; Ability to set survey deactivation time

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Admins can configure a group policy to block specific folders from OneDrive Sync
CurrentVersion.description: In addition to being able to configure a group policy to exclude specific files or file extensions from Syncing with OneDrive, admins can now exclude folders as well. End-users will be able to see the excluded folders in the Sync configuration applied to them via their OneDrive Advanced Settings.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Admins can configure a group policy to block specific folders from OneDrive Sync
OldVersion.description: In addition to being able to configure a group policy to exclude specific files or file extensions from Syncing with OneDrive, admins can now exclude folders as well. End-users will be able to see the excluded folders in the Sync configuration applied to them via their OneDrive Advanced Settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) Jobs report - access for eDiscovery Manager
CurrentVersion.description: The access to the Jobs Report in eDiscovery (Premium) will be extended to eDiscovery Managers. eD Managers will be able to view the tenant wide quota available and list of jobs in the cases they have access to.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) Jobs report - access for eDiscovery Manager
OldVersion.description: The access to the Jobs Report in eDiscovery (Premium) will be extended to eDiscovery Managers. eD Managers will be able to view the tenant wide quota available and list of jobs in the cases they have access to.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to rename the policy and rule names in DLP
CurrentVersion.description: This feature gives the ability for the DLP admin to rename the existing policy/rule without having to create the entire the rule or policy again.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to rename the policy and rule names in DLP
OldVersion.description: This feature gives the ability for the DLP admin to rename the existing policy/rule without having to create the entire the rule or policy again.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook Mobile - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for iOS and Outlook for Android can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook Mobile - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
OldVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for iOS and Outlook for Android can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Junk/Phishing reporting actions integrated with Microsoft Defender in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in classic Outlook for Windows can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Viva Learning will act as a virtual learning companion, assisting users throughout their learning journey and providing personalized guidance, recommendations, and the ability to take actions. Users will be able to leverage Copilot to preview and consume courses from Copilot’s search results, create learning collections in a single click, and see highly relevant search results by asking questions in natural language. Copilot will be visible to users on the Home page, My Learning tab, course details pages, and on Academies.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot in Viva Learning
OldVersion.description: Copilot in Viva Learning will act as a virtual learning companion, assisting users throughout their learning journey and providing personalized guidance, recommendations, and the ability to take actions. Users will be able to leverage Copilot to preview and consume courses from Copilot’s search results, create learning collections in a single click, and see highly relevant search results by asking questions in natural language. Copilot will be visible to users on the Home page, My Learning tab, course details pages, and on Academies.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: 45 days after last used for Allow
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can configure allows to be removed after 45 days from the last used date. This way they can keep ensuring the delivery of the emails till the filtering has learned.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: 45 days after last used for Allow
OldVersion.description: Admins can configure allows to be removed after 45 days from the last used date. This way they can keep ensuring the delivery of the emails till the filtering has learned.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot with commercial data protection
CurrentVersion.description: A new product usage report will be added in the Microsoft 365 admin center providing insights into active usage of Microsoft Copilot with commercial data protection. The report will include total active users, average daily active users, and active users per platform (i.e. Bing, Edge, Windows, copilot.microsoft.com, and Copilot mobile app). Usage insights can be viewed as totals and trends for the past 7, 30, 90 or 180-day periods. The report will also show the last activity date per user, anonymized by default.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot with commercial data protection
OldVersion.description: A new product usage report will be added in the Microsoft 365 admin center providing insights into active usage of Microsoft Copilot with commercial data protection. The report will include total active users, average daily active users, and active users per platform (i.e. Bing, Edge, Windows, copilot.microsoft.com, and Copilot mobile app). Usage insights can be viewed as totals and trends for the past 7, 30, 90 or 180-day periods. The report will also show the last activity date per user, anonymized by default.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to rename the policy and rule names in DLP
CurrentVersion.description: This feature gives the ability for the DLP admin to rename the existing policy/rule without having to create the entire the rule or policy again.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to rename the policy and rule names in DLP
OldVersion.description: This feature gives the ability for the DLP admin to rename the existing policy/rule without having to create the entire the rule or policy again.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Reactions in Town halls (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Participants can use reactions (like, love, applause, laugh, surprised) to express themselves during a town hall and the reactions appear as a continuous stream on the side of the screen.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Reactions in Town halls (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Participants can use reactions (like, love, applause, laugh, surprised) to express themselves during a town hall and the reactions appear as a continuous stream on the side of the screen.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Copilot in OneDrive
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in OneDrive, available on OneDrive for Web, will allow you to ask questions and get information from files in your OneDrive without having to open the files. It will also summarize one or multiple files. Copilot in OneDrive will work on the following file types: DOC, DOCX, FLUID, LOOP, PPT, PPTX, XLSX, PDF, ODT, ODP, RTF, ASPX, RTF, TXT, HTM, and HTML. Copilot in OneDrive requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Copilot in OneDrive
OldVersion.description: Copilot in OneDrive, available on OneDrive for Web, will allow you to ask questions and get information from files in your OneDrive without having to open the files. It will also summarize one or multiple files. Copilot in OneDrive will work on the following file types: DOC, DOCX, FLUID, LOOP, PPT, PPTX, XLSX, PDF, ODT, ODP, RTF, ASPX, RTF, TXT, HTM, and HTML. Copilot in OneDrive requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Enhancements to available metadata for search and collection queries
CurrentVersion.description: Now eDiscovery admins can use additional metadata to search and collect content within their organization. The additional metadata that will be added for support will include message ID, sensitivity label and more to help enable additional flexibility of search for specific scenarios to enable specific outcomes related to investigations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Enhancements to available metadata for search and collection queries
OldVersion.description: Now eDiscovery admins can use additional metadata to search and collect content within their organization. The additional metadata that will be added for support will include message ID, sensitivity label and more to help enable additional flexibility of search for specific scenarios to enable specific outcomes related to investigations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Microsoft Edge for Business - Customize organizational branding using Edge Management Service
CurrentVersion.description:
Admins can customize their organization's branding assets through Microsoft Edge management service onto Edge for Business. Admins can enable and configure branding onto profile-related UI for profiles signed in with an Entra ID (formerly known as Azure Active Directory) account. You can configure your organization’s details such as name to the profile pill; name, logo, and brand color to the profile flyout; and logo to overlay the Edge for Business taskbar icon. This branding can help users more easily differentiate between multiple profiles and browser windows. This Microsoft Edge management service will give admins an enhanced experience to control, preview, and customize assets.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-for-business#company-branding

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Microsoft Edge for Business - Customize organizational branding using Edge Management Service
OldVersion.description:
Admins can customize their organization's branding assets through Microsoft Edge management service onto Edge for Business. Admins can enable and configure branding onto profile-related UI for profiles signed in with an Entra ID (formerly known as Azure Active Directory) account. You can configure your organization’s details such as name to the profile pill; name, logo, and brand color to the profile flyout; and logo to overlay the Edge for Business taskbar icon. This branding can help users more easily differentiate between multiple profiles and browser windows. This Microsoft Edge management service will give admins an enhanced experience to control, preview, and customize assets.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-for-business#company-branding

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Notifications and Nudges in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Users can receive survey notifications and nudges in Teams

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Notifications and Nudges in Teams
OldVersion.description: Users can receive survey notifications and nudges in Teams

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Town Hall Graph APIs
CurrentVersion.description: The Teams town hall Graph APIs allow users to create, update, and delete town hall events.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Town Hall Graph APIs
OldVersion.description: The Teams town hall Graph APIs allow users to create, update, and delete town hall events.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting details displayed on pre-join screen
CurrentVersion.description: Available for in-tenant participants, the meeting pre-join screen will now include contextual information about the meeting like meeting title, scheduled start time, scheduled end time, and number of participants who have joined the call.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting details displayed on pre-join screen
OldVersion.description: Available for in-tenant participants, the meeting pre-join screen will now include contextual information about the meeting like meeting title, scheduled start time, scheduled end time, and number of participants who have joined the call.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Select specific pieces of text in an email and use Copilot to rewrite them
CurrentVersion.description: When composing an email, customers can select portions of text in an email and use Copilot to rewrite it. Users can give detailed instructions on how to rewrite and also able to modify tone and length. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Highlight and rewrite for draft with Copilot in new Outlook for Windows and web
OldVersion.description: Similar to Microsoft Word, highlight and rewrite capabilities will allow users to select specific sentences in their email draft and have them rewritten by Copilot. Using highlight and rewrite when drafting with Copilot in Outlook, users will be able to give detailed instructions on how to rewrite and be able to modify tone and length. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting options to control participants' ability to admit attendees from meeting lobby
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting organizers will have options in the meeting settings on who can admit attendees from the lobby into the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting options to control participants' ability to admit attendees from meeting lobby
OldVersion.description: Meeting organizers will have options in the meeting settings on who can admit attendees from the lobby into the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Decoupling of Policy tips and Email notifications while configuring rules on Data Loss Prevention for Sharepoint and Onedrive
CurrentVersion.description: As of today, whenever the user wants to enable email notifications the policy tips also need to be enabled and vice versa, but with this decoupling the admin can configure the following: 1) None of policy tips or email notification 2) Only policy tips 3) Only Email Notifications 4) Both Email Notifications and Policy tips

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Decoupling of Policy tips and Email notifications while configuring rules on Data Loss Prevention for Sharepoint and Onedrive
OldVersion.description: As of today, whenever the user wants to enable email notifications the policy tips also need to be enabled and vice versa, but with this decoupling the admin can configure the following: 1) None of policy tips or email notification 2) Only policy tips 3) Only Email Notifications 4) Both Email Notifications and Policy tips

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview portal now supports user search functionality
CurrentVersion.description: Our global search feature now enables you to search for users within your organization. You’ll find basic information such as names and email addresses. Additionally, if you have role management privileges, you can view assigned role groups and admin units. This means now you can search for navigational results, data, learning resources, and also for users within your organization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview portal now supports user search functionality
OldVersion.description: Our global search feature now enables you to search for users within your organization. You’ll find basic information such as names and email addresses. Additionally, if you have role management privileges, you can view assigned role groups and admin units. This means now you can search for navigational results, data, learning resources, and also for users within your organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Decoupling of Policy tips and Email notifications while configuring rules on Data Loss Prevention for Sharepoint and Onedriv
CurrentVersion.description: As of today, whenever the user wants to enable email notifications the policy tips also need to be enabled and vice versa, but with this decoupling the admin can configure the following: 1) None of policy tips or email notification 2) Only policy tips 3) Only Email Notifications 4) Both Email Notifications and Policy tips

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Decoupling of Policy tips and Email notifications while configuring rules on Data Loss Prevention for Sharepoint and Onedriv
OldVersion.description: As of today, whenever the user wants to enable email notifications the policy tips also need to be enabled and vice versa, but with this decoupling the admin can configure the following: 1) None of policy tips or email notification 2) Only policy tips 3) Only Email Notifications 4) Both Email Notifications and Policy tips

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Webinar Creation and Registration APIs
CurrentVersion.description: Customers now have additional capabilities to manage Webinars, namely the ability to create, update, and delete Webinars, as well as register attendees to existing Webinars using a new set of APIs.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Webinar Creation and Registration APIs
OldVersion.description: Customers now have additional capabilities to manage Webinars, namely the ability to create, update, and delete Webinars, as well as register attendees to existing Webinars using a new set of APIs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Message result suggestions when typing to search
CurrentVersion.description: You will now see message result suggestions when formulating a query. You can also narrow down search results to "messages" helping you quickly find Teams message content most relevant for you.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Message result suggestions when typing to search
OldVersion.description: You will now see message result suggestions when formulating a query. You can also narrow down search results to "messages" helping you quickly find Teams message content most relevant for you.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Avatar interaction improvements in Immersive space view
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing more avatar reactions and personal boundary on avatars.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Avatar interaction improvements in Immersive space view
OldVersion.description: Introducing more avatar reactions and personal boundary on avatars.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Show/hide discover feed
CurrentVersion.description: You will now have the flexibility to show or hide (turn off/turn on) discover feed. Users can access this new toggle from the general settings section.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Show/hide discover feed
OldVersion.description: You will now have the flexibility to show or hide (turn off/turn on) discover feed. Users can access this new toggle from the general settings section.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: Define criteria for validating responses to open-text questions in Microsoft Forms
CurrentVersion.description: Now you can set specific requirements for answers to open-text questions. You can ensure the answer is an email address, URL, contains certain keywords, must be number or text, etc.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: Define criteria for validating responses to open-text questions in Microsoft Forms
OldVersion.description: Now you can set specific requirements for answers to open-text questions. You can ensure the answer is an email address, URL, contains certain keywords, must be number or text, etc.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Video drafting in Copilot powered by Clipchamp
CurrentVersion.description: Clipchamp brings video creation skills to Copilot. Type your prompt and Clipchamp will write a bespoke script, source high quality stock footage, and assemble a video project with music, voiceover, text overlays and transitions. Open your video project draft in the Clipchamp app to continue to edit, export, and share. This feature is great for informational videos, video messaging, how-to videos, demos, and video presentations.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Use the Alt key to bring up key tips in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users in new Outlook will now be able to use the Alt key to bring up key tips when using keyboard navigation. This behavior was previously Win+Alt. Other Outlook apps will not be impacted by these changes. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Use the Alt key to bring up key tips in new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: Users in new Outlook will now be able to use the Alt key to bring up key tips when using keyboard navigation. This behavior was previously Win+Alt. Other Outlook apps will not be impacted by these changes. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Using Data Access Governance to understand the tenant's current permission landscape
CurrentVersion.description:
SharePoint admins can now use Data Access Governance (DAG) to understand their tenant's current permission landscape and make better decisions regarding applications based on permissions such as Copilot. DAG now provides a report that will reflect the latest state of permissions in the entire tenant and return sites that have a greater count of permissioned users than the SharePoint admin specified number. This count considers users accessing sites via site membership and users accessing via unique permissions, as well and acts like a potential threshold for oversharing. Along with the permissioned user count, the report also provides information on the number of existing sharing links (Anyone and People-in-your-org) in those sites and enables SharePoint admins to identify potential root causes for oversharing. You can find more details about this report at the link below.
More info: https://aka.ms/DAGReportOnPermissions

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Site Access Review offers a way for SharePoint tenants to empower site owners using Data Access Governance
CurrentVersion.description:
SharePoint admins can use Data Access Governance reports to discover potential oversharing within their tenant. Once discovered, SharePoint admins can now request that site owners review permissions using the specific context of that report from within the report. They can also track all such requests raised from a central location. The site owners will receive a corresponding email and are redirected to a section within the site (site reviews) that clearly enunciates the corresponding data related to sharing and permissions along with the ability to take action. This feature is now available for Data Access Governance - Permissions based reports - count of permissioned user report.
More info: https://aka.ms/DAGSiteAccessReviews

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Separation of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 retention policy location from Microsoft Teams chats
CurrentVersion.description: Today, admins must manage retention and deletion for Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions using a retention policy location that also includes Microsoft Teams chats. This feature will provide a new location option to manage only Copilot interactions, separate from Microsoft Teams chats.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Enhanced device inventory for Windows devices
CurrentVersion.description: Gain more inventory information about your Windows devices. Choose which device properties you want to collect from which device and then view that information for your devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Notification in Activity feed and banner when intelligent meeting recap is ready
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent meeting recap users will receive a notification in Teams Activity feed and banner when intelligent meeting recap is ready. Clicking on the notification in Activity feed will take users right to the intelligent meeting recap experience, which will be visible to the right of the Activity feed. Users can configure their notification settings in Teams settings > Notifications and activity > Apps > Meeting Recap to control where the notification is surfaced (Activity and banner, Activity only, Off) as well as which meetings have notifications enabled (for only meetings with RSVP selection of “Follow,” or all other meetings, or both).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Notification in Activity feed and banner when intelligent meeting recap is ready
OldVersion.description: Intelligent meeting recap users will receive a notification in Teams Activity feed and banner when intelligent meeting recap is ready. Clicking on the notification in Activity feed will take users right to the intelligent meeting recap experience, which will be visible to the right of the Activity feed. Users can configure their notification settings in Teams settings > Notifications and activity > Apps > Meeting Recap to control where the notification is surfaced (Activity and banner, Activity only, Off) as well as which meetings have notifications enabled (for only meetings with RSVP selection of “Follow,” or all other meetings, or both).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: List-based Forms card for Viva Connections Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow operators to add a card for any form/survey created for data collection on the Viva Connections Dashboard for attention and quick action.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Bulk upload for Priority User Groups
CurrentVersion.description: Insider Risk Management Priority user groups will now support bulk upload capabilities.  An IRM administrator will be able to upload a CSV of UPNs that they would like to add to a new or existing priority user group. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Bulk upload for Priority User Groups
OldVersion.description: Insider Risk Management Priority user groups will now support bulk upload capabilities.  An IRM administrator will be able to upload a CSV of UPNs that they would like to add to a new or existing priority user group. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.description: Add calendar support in Online Archive.

CurrentVersion.description: Participants can use reactions (like, love, applause, laugh, surprised) to express themselves during a town hall and the reactions appear as a continuous stream on the side of the screen.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Copilot in OneDrive
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in OneDrive, available on OneDrive for Web, will allow you to ask questions and get information from files in your OneDrive without having to open the files. It will also summarize one or multiple files. Copilot in OneDrive will work on the following file types: DOC, DOCX, FLUID, LOOP, PPT, PPTX, XLSX, PDF, ODT, ODP, RTF, ASPX, RTF, TXT, HTM, and HTML. Copilot in OneDrive requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Enhancements to available metadata for search and collection queries
CurrentVersion.description: Now eDiscovery admins can use additional metadata to search and collect content within their organization. The additional metadata that will be added for support will include message ID, sensitivity label and more to help enable additional flexibility of search for specific scenarios to enable specific outcomes related to investigations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Microsoft Edge for Business - Customize organizational branding using Edge Management Service
CurrentVersion.description:
Admins can customize their organization's branding assets through Microsoft Edge management service onto Edge for Business. Admins can enable and configure branding onto profile-related UI for profiles signed in with an Entra ID (formerly known as Azure Active Directory) account. You can configure your organization’s details such as name to the profile pill; name, logo, and brand color to the profile flyout; and logo to overlay the Edge for Business taskbar icon. This branding can help users more easily differentiate between multiple profiles and browser windows. This Microsoft Edge management service will give admins an enhanced experience to control, preview, and customize assets.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-for-business#company-branding

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Notifications and Nudges in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Users can receive survey notifications and nudges in Teams

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Town Hall Graph APIs
CurrentVersion.description: The Teams town hall Graph APIs allow users to create, update, and delete town hall events.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting details displayed on pre-join screen
CurrentVersion.description: Available for in-tenant participants, the meeting pre-join screen will now include contextual information about the meeting like meeting title, scheduled start time, scheduled end time, and number of participants who have joined the call.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Select specific pieces of text in an email and use Copilot to rewrite them
CurrentVersion.description: When composing an email, customers can select portions of text in an email and use Copilot to rewrite it. Users can give detailed instructions on how to rewrite and also able to modify tone and length. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting options to control participants' ability to admit attendees from meeting lobby
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting organizers will have options in the meeting settings on who can admit attendees from the lobby into the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Decoupling of Policy tips and Email notifications while configuring rules on Data Loss Prevention for Sharepoint and Onedrive
CurrentVersion.description: As of today, whenever the user wants to enable email notifications the policy tips also need to be enabled and vice versa, but with this decoupling the admin can configure the following: 1) None of policy tips or email notification 2) Only policy tips 3) Only Email Notifications 4) Both Email Notifications and Policy tips

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview portal now supports user search functionality
CurrentVersion.description: Our global search feature now enables you to search for users within your organization. You’ll find basic information such as names and email addresses. Additionally, if you have role management privileges, you can view assigned role groups and admin units. This means now you can search for navigational results, data, learning resources, and also for users within your organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Decoupling of Policy tips and Email notifications while configuring rules on Data Loss Prevention for Sharepoint and Onedriv
CurrentVersion.description: As of today, whenever the user wants to enable email notifications the policy tips also need to be enabled and vice versa, but with this decoupling the admin can configure the following: 1) None of policy tips or email notification 2) Only policy tips 3) Only Email Notifications 4) Both Email Notifications and Policy tips

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Webinar Creation and Registration APIs
CurrentVersion.description: Customers now have additional capabilities to manage Webinars, namely the ability to create, update, and delete Webinars, as well as register attendees to existing Webinars using a new set of APIs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Message result suggestions when typing to search
CurrentVersion.description: You will now see message result suggestions when formulating a query. You can also narrow down search results to "messages" helping you quickly find Teams message content most relevant for you.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Avatar interaction improvements in Immersive space view
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing more avatar reactions and personal boundary on avatars.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Show/hide discover feed
CurrentVersion.description: You will now have the flexibility to show or hide (turn off/turn on) discover feed. Users can access this new toggle from the general settings section.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: Define criteria for validating responses to open-text questions in Microsoft Forms
CurrentVersion.description: Now you can set specific requirements for answers to open-text questions. You can ensure the answer is an email address, URL, contains certain keywords, must be number or text, etc.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Video drafting in Copilot powered by Clipchamp
CurrentVersion.description: Clipchamp brings video creation skills to Copilot. Type your prompt and Clipchamp will write a bespoke script, source high quality stock footage, and assemble a video project with music, voiceover, text overlays and transitions. Open your video project draft in the Clipchamp app to continue to edit, export, and share. This feature is great for informational videos, video messaging, how-to videos, demos, and video presentations.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Use the Alt key to bring up key tips in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users in new Outlook will now be able to use the Alt key to bring up key tips when using keyboard navigation. This behavior was previously Win+Alt. Other Outlook apps will not be impacted by these changes. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Using Data Access Governance to understand the tenant's current permission landscape
CurrentVersion.description:
SharePoint admins can now use Data Access Governance (DAG) to understand their tenant's current permission landscape and make better decisions regarding applications based on permissions such as Copilot. DAG now provides a report that will reflect the latest state of permissions in the entire tenant and return sites that have a greater count of permissioned users than the SharePoint admin specified number. This count considers users accessing sites via site membership and users accessing via unique permissions, as well and acts like a potential threshold for oversharing. Along with the permissioned user count, the report also provides information on the number of existing sharing links (Anyone and People-in-your-org) in those sites and enables SharePoint admins to identify potential root causes for oversharing. You can find more details about this report at the link below.
More info: https://aka.ms/DAGReportOnPermissions

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Site Access Review offers a way for SharePoint tenants to empower site owners using Data Access Governance
CurrentVersion.description:
SharePoint admins can use Data Access Governance reports to discover potential oversharing within their tenant. Once discovered, SharePoint admins can now request that site owners review permissions using the specific context of that report from within the report. They can also track all such requests raised from a central location. The site owners will receive a corresponding email and are redirected to a section within the site (site reviews) that clearly enunciates the corresponding data related to sharing and permissions along with the ability to take action. This feature is now available for Data Access Governance - Permissions based reports - count of permissioned user report.
More info: https://aka.ms/DAGSiteAccessReviews

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Separation of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 retention policy location from Microsoft Teams chats
CurrentVersion.description: Today, admins must manage retention and deletion for Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions using a retention policy location that also includes Microsoft Teams chats. This feature will provide a new location option to manage only Copilot interactions, separate from Microsoft Teams chats.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Enhanced device inventory for Windows devices
CurrentVersion.description: Gain more inventory information about your Windows devices. Choose which device properties you want to collect from which device and then view that information for your devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Notification in Activity feed and banner when intelligent meeting recap is ready
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent meeting recap users will receive a notification in Teams Activity feed and banner when intelligent meeting recap is ready. Clicking on the notification in Activity feed will take users right to the intelligent meeting recap experience, which will be visible to the right of the Activity feed. Users can configure their notification settings in Teams settings > Notifications and activity > Apps > Meeting Recap to control where the notification is surfaced (Activity and banner, Activity only, Off) as well as which meetings have notifications enabled (for only meetings with RSVP selection of “Follow,” or all other meetings, or both).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: List-based Forms card for Viva Connections Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow operators to add a card for any form/survey created for data collection on the Viva Connections Dashboard for attention and quick action.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Bulk upload for Priority User Groups
CurrentVersion.description: Insider Risk Management Priority user groups will now support bulk upload capabilities.  An IRM administrator will be able to upload a CSV of UPNs that they would like to add to a new or existing priority user group. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Calendar support in Online Archive
CurrentVersion.description: Add calendar support in Online Archive.
